tr.td: s:40 year old female presents with denies breast pain or discharge mild,breast mass mild,eczamatoid lesion in the areola oh her right breast mild x the last 1 days o:Height 154 cm,Weight 50.2 kg,Temperature 36.3 C,Pulse 80 bpm,DiastolicBP 80 ,SystolicBP 120 ,Respiration 16 bpm Skin = warm, dry a:Breast Cancer p:prescribe trastuzumab - 4 mg/kg; IV and schedule lumpectomy - breast,Sentinel lymph node biopsy - breast
